name: Snowshake Park
description:
Snowshake Park

It is a hot summer day, and the city has decided to add some nice new trees to their new park: Snowshake Park. Suddenly, a snowstorm comes despite of the summer heat and the city hires you to shake down the snow from the trees in order to keep them alive. Good Luck!

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Play the tutorial, lure olof from one point to another! When creating your own levels you can right and left click to place and remove the different items! You can also right click on the user maps to remove them. 

BUGS:

- There is a memory leak with Olof the snowman. If enough people enjoy this game, we'll probably try to fix it. We realized this last minute, so we didn't really have the time to come up with a fix.

- Game does not work in firefox for some reason.
